Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Crime | Drama
Status: Returning Series
Network: BBC One ( United Kingdom)

Silk is a drama series starring Maxine Peake, Rupert Penry-Jones, Natalie Dormer, Tom Hughes and Neil Stuke. The series following the lives, loves and hard cases facing barristers on the front line of criminal law. The series is created by Peter Moffat.

(http://www.tvrage.com/Silk)

^ I was thanking lawrj11 for up'ing the ep (really appreciate it, lawrj11), but forgot to also, thank b1893757. It's a really cool thing to take the time/effort do, and it's sincerely appreciated. 

Thx b1893757!
